verses.roman:
saba śrotā-vaiṣṇavere kari' namaskāra
ei saba ślokera kari artha-vicāra

synonyms: saba—all; śrotā—hearers or audience; vaiṣṇavere—unto the Vaiṣṇavas; kari'-offering; namaskāra—obeisances; ei saba ślokera—of all these (fourteen) verses; kari—I make; artha—of the meaning; vicāra—analysis.
translation: I offer my obeisances unto all my Vaiṣṇava readers as I begin to explain the intricacies of all these verses.
